plays.text: Penalty to Marty Reasoner 2 minutes for Tripping Joe DiPenta
Penalty to Petteri Wirtanen 2 minutes for Slashing Ales Hemsky
Goal scored by Ales Hemsky assisted by Shawn Horcoff
Penalty to Samuel Pahlsson 2 minutes for Hooking Ladislav Smid
Penalty to Sean O'Donnell 2 minutes for Cross checking Shawn Horcoff
Goal scored by Chris Kunitz assisted by Corey Perry
Penalty to Francois Beauchemin 2 minutes for Hooking Jarret Stoll
Goal scored by Corey Perry assisted by Andy McDonald
Penalty to Zack Stortini 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for High-sticking Corey Perry
Goal scored by Andrew Cogliano (Shorthanded) assisted by Geoff Sanderson and Tom Gilbert
Corey Perry shootout attempt against Mathieu Garon with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Sam Gagner shootout attempt against Jean-Sebastien Giguere with a Wristshot results in a GOAL.
Chris Kunitz shootout attempt against Mathieu Garon with a Snapshot results in a SAVE.
Ales Hemsky shootout attempt against Jean-Sebastien Giguere with a Backhand results in a GOAL.
